toys.name: Iron Man
toys.description: Bring the heroic Tony Stark to life with this highly detailed Iron Man action figure. Perfect for fans of the Avengers franchise.

toys.name: Captain America
toys.description: Join the fight for justice with this Captain America action figure. Stand up against evil and defend the innocent.

toys.name: Spider-Man
toys.description: Swing into action with this Spider-Man action figure. With his web-slinging abilities and keen senses, Spider-Man fights crime and protects the city from villains.

toys.name: Darth Vader
toys.description: Embrace the dark side with this Darth Vader action figure. Rule the galaxy with the power of the Sith.

toys.name: Yoda
toys.description: Discover the wisdom of Yoda with this detailed action figure. May the Force be with you.

toys.name: Stormtroopers
toys.description: Join the Imperial forces with these Stormtrooper action figures. Equipped with their iconic white armor, they are the backbone of the Galactic Empire's military.

toys.name: Optimus Prime
toys.description: Lead the Autobots into battle with this Optimus Prime action figure. Protect Earth from the Decepticons.

toys.name: Bumblebee
toys.description: Join the courageous Bumblebee on exciting adventures with this action figure. Defeat the evil Decepticons.

toys.name: Megatron
toys.description: Unleash the power of Megatron with this action figure. As the ruthless leader of the Decepticons, he seeks to conquer and dominate the universe, opposing Optimus Prime and the Autobots.
